snippet: A basketball coach was charged with battery after witnesses said he punched one of his teenage players in the face and threw her to the ground after a loss in a youth tournament.
abstract: Girls' high school basketball coach Fred Freeman of Hartford, Wis, is charged with battery after witnesses say he punched one of his teenage players in the face and threw her to the ground after a loss in a youth tournament.
lead_paragraph: A basketball coach was charged with battery after witnesses said he punched one of his teenage players in the face and threw her to the ground after a loss in a youth tournament.
